cause.description:
Save the Children is an Organization You Can Trust.
You can be assured that Save the Children spends dollars efficiently. Save the Children is ranked high among other nonprofit organizations. In fiscal year 2009, 90 percent of all expenditures went to program services. That percentage is an average for all of Save the Children's programs worldwide.

1. Our Vision is a world in which every child attains the right to survival, protection, development and participation.
